trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una composizione durante gli eventi di input di testo di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is a FrameworkTextComposition when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è un FrameworkTextComposition quando l'utente immette il testo in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>utilizzando un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] e <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: FrameworkTextComposition is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkTextComposition è la classe base <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>classe definisce le proprietà che restituiscono <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>oggetti per indicare la posizione della composizione del testo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente immette testo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: Finalizza la composizione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la lunghezza della composizione corrente in simboli Unicode.

trans-unit.source: The CompositionLength property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà CompositionLength indica il numero di caratteri immessa dopo l'ultimo <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è significativa solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, CompositionLength is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>si verifica l'evento, CompositionLength è -1 e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>proprietà indica la lunghezza della composizione.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionLength è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [versioni e dipendenze](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza della composizione corrente nei simboli di Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione in cui la composizione del testo si verifica nel <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è significativa solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento si verifica, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A>,-1 e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A>proprietà indica la posizione del testo di composizione.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: CompositionOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CompositionOffset è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [versioni e dipendenze](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La posizione in cui la composizione del testo si verifica nel <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la lunghezza del testo in formato Unicode finalizzato simboli quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, ResultLength is –1.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>si verifica l'evento, ResultLength è -1.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultLength is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultLength è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [versioni e dipendenze](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza del testo in formato Unicode finalizzato simboli quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'offset del testo finalizzato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>evento si verifica, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A>è -1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>

trans-unit.source: ResultOffset is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResultOffset è stato introdotto in .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [versioni e dipendenze](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: L'offset del testo finalizzato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>
